revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=X3500 |revision= |asin=B00BMPB4TS;GB; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_date=11/15/2012 |fcc_id=Q87-X3500 |ic_id=3839A-X3500 |pcb_id=2976419802 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361U;BCM6361UKFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361U;BCM6361UKFEBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Delta Networks |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331;BCM4331KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |addl_chips=5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2594L;;3; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=C8:D7:19 |oui_eth=C8:D7:19 }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band N750 Wireless Router with ADSL2+ Modem and USB}} :[http://www.linksys.com/en-eu/products/gateways/X3500 Product page]
*"2976419802" and the ''[[Cisco]]'' logo is silkscreened on the board in the photos. *"2976387400" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. :The WiSoC shown in the FCC photos is a BCM6361UKFEBS.
Possibly manuf. by [http://www.ayecom.com/ Ayecom] (a subsidiary of ''DNI'' / ''[[Delta Networks]]'')?
Probable C8:D7:19 OUI (it's on a MAC label on the EUT wireless module label)
